name: Deep Moss
meaning: The color of ancient forests and untouched wilderness. Deep Moss brings a grounding, restorative energy to any space, connecting us back to the earth.

name: Pacific Depths
meaning: A profound, boundless blue representing the mystery of the open ocean. It evokes silence, depth, and infinite possibility.

name: Morning Mist
meaning: The soft, diffused light of early morning. A neutral tone that clears the mind and offers a blank canvas for new beginnings.

name: Terracotta Clay
meaning: Warm, baked earth functionality. Terracotta represents craftsmanship, home, and the raw beauty of natural materials.
